newsitem.title: UK: N.Elec has no comment on London Elec reports.
newsitem.headline: N.Elec has no comment on London Elec reports.

text.p: Hostile-bid target Northern Electric Plc said on Wednesday it had no comment on newspaper reports London Electricity Plc was its potential partner in a plan to merge its electricity and gas supply businesses.

Northern unveiled the merger plan on Tuesday as part of its defence against a 650p-per-share bid from U.S. untility CE Energy, which is controlled by CalEnergy Co Inc, but did not name the other company.
Several UK newspapers named London as the potential partner, noting that its call centre and billing operations are in Sunderland, near to Northern's northeast England headquarters.
"We are not commenting," said a spokesman for Northern on the issue.
No spokesman for London Electricity, which is due to report half-year results on Thursday, was immediately available.
